column4: Can anyone else help me? Enemy Territoty refuses to run at fullscreen mode
do you think you can help me with Enemy Territory?
can't get it to run in fullscreen mode
whats the error when you go fullscreen, paste the log in the paste bin, and copy the link here
no error, it just won't go fullscreen, it stays in window mode, even if i tick "fullscreen: yes" in the game config
type cg_<tab> in the console, there should be a fullscreen cvar, try setting that to 1
give me a min to do some googleing
is the rez u are trying to use supported by x
the cvar for fullscreen is r_fullscreen
